## Table 1

```{r}
#read in dataset
demo <- read.csv("C:/Users/Eddie/OneDrive/Desktop/BIOSTAT/Thesis/Thesis/DataProcessed/demo.csv")
```

```{r}
#add labels
demo$Sex <- factor(
  demo$Sex,
  levels = c('F','M'),
  labels = c("Female", "Male")
)

demo$CharacterJW <- factor(
  demo$CharacterJW,
  levels = c(1,2,3,4),
  labels = c("NB-C", "NB-S","Fibrocavitary","Unclassified")
)

#create descriptive table using table1
table1(~ Age + Sex | CharacterJW, data = demo,
       caption = "Table 1: Descriptive Statistics by NTM Classification")

```
